00009 /**
00010  * A component for object oriented session handling using normal filesystem based sessions
00011  * @author mnt@codeninka.de
00012  * @package kata
00013  * @ignore
00014  */
00015 class SessionComponent
00016 {
00017              /**
00018               * placeholder for controller that owns this component
00019               * @var object
00020               */
00021              public $controller = false;
00022 
00023              /**
00024               * array of strings of component-names this component needs to function. null or false if none.
00025               * @var array
00026               */
00027              public $components = array();
00028 
00029              /**
00030               * path that we use when we set the cookie
00031               * @var string
00032               */
00033              private $path;
00034              /**
00035               * useragent that we use when we set/check a session-cookie
00036               * @var string
00037               */
00038              private $userAgent=null;
00039 
00040              /**
00041               * time that we use when we check a session cookie
00042               * @var int
00043               */
00044              private $time=0;
00045 
00046              /**
00047               * time after that the session expires (normally time+SESSION_TIMEOUT, as set in config/core.php)
00048               * @var int
00049               */
00050              private $sessionTime=0;
00051 
00052              /**
00053               * perform needed initialization and cache the controller that called us
00054               */
00055              public function startup(&$controller)
00056              {
00057                           $this->controller=$controller;
00058 
00059                           if (SESSION_START) {
00060 
00061                                        if (empty($this->controller->basePath)) {
00062                                                     $this->path = '/';
00063                                        } else {
00064                                                     $this->path = $this->controller->basePath;
00065                                        }
00066 
00067                                        $this->time=time();
00068                                        if (SESSION_TIMEOUT>0) {
00069                                                     $this->sessionTime=$this->time+SESSION_TIMEOUT;
00070                                        } else {
00071                                                     $this->sessionTime=0;
00072                                        }
00073 
00074                                        if (env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') != null) {
00075                                                     $this->userAgent = md5(env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') . $this->getIp(). SESSION_STRING);
00076                                        } else {
00077                                                     $this->userAgent = md5($this->getIp().SESSION_STRING);
00078                                        }
00079 
00080                                        try {
00081                                                     session_write_close();
00082                                                     $this->initSession();
00083                                                     $this->checkValid();
00084                                        } catch (Exception $e) {
00085                                                     session_destroy();
00086                                                     setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE,false);
00087                                                     $this->initSession();
00088                                                     $this->checkvalid();
00089                                        }
00090                           }
00091              }
00092 
00093              /**
00094               * default constructor. initializes some variables needed to construct a session
00095               * and tries to start/continue a session, throws exception if that fails
00096               */
00097              function __construct () {
00098                           kataMakeTmpPath('sessions');
00099              }
00100 
00101              /**
00102               * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session
00103               */
00104              private function initSession() {
00105                           ini_set('session.use_trans_sid', 0);
00106                           ini_set('url_rewriter.tags', '');
00107                           ini_set('session.serialize_handler', 'php');
00108                           ini_set('session.use_cookies', 1);
00109                           ini_set('session.name', SESSION_COOKIE);
00110                           ini_set('session.cookie_lifetime', SESSION_TIMEOUT);
00111                           ini_set('session.gc_maxlifetime', SESSION_TIMEOUT+1);
00112                           ini_set('session.cookie_path', $this->path);
00113                           ini_set('session.gc_probability', 1);
00114                           ini_set('session.auto_start', 0);
00115                           ini_set('session.save_path', KATATMP.'sessions');
00116 
00117                           session_cache_limiter("must-revalidate");
00118                           header('P3P: CP="NOI ADM DEV PSAi COM NAV OUR OTRo STP IND DEM"');
00119                           session_start();
00120              }
00121 
00122              /**
00123               * check if the session expired, or something suspicious happend
00124               */
00125              private function checkValid() {
00126                           if ($this->read('Config')) {
00127                                        if ($this->userAgent == $this->read('Config.userAgent') && (($this->read('Config.time')==0)||($this->time <= $this->read('Config.time')))) {
00128                                                     $this->write('Config.time', $this->sessionTime);
00129                                        } else {
00130                                                     throw new Exception('Session Highjacking detected');
00131                                        }
00132                           } else {
00133                                        srand ((double)microtime() * 1000000);
00134                                        $this->write('Config',1);
00135                                        $this->write('Config.userAgent', $this->userAgent);
00136                                        $this->write('Config.time', $this->sessionTime);
00137                                        $this->write('Config.rand', rand());
00138                           }
00139              }
00140 
00141              /**
00142               * read value(s) from the session container.
00143               * returns all currently set values if called with null
00144               * returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave
00145               * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00146               */
00147              public function read($name = null) {
00148                           if (is_null($name)) {
00149                                        return $_SESSION;
00150                           }
00151 
00152                           if (empty($name)) {
00153                                        return false;
00154                           }
00155 
00156                           if (isset($_SESSION[$name]) && !is_null($_SESSION[$name])) {
00157                                        return $_SESSION[$name];
00158                           }
00159                           return null;
00160              }
00161 
00162              /**
00163               * write mixed values to the session-component.
00164               * @param string $name identifier, may contain alphanumeric characters or .-_
00165               * @param mixed $value values to store
00166               */
00167              public function write($name, $value) {
00168                           $var = $this->validateKeyName($name);
00169 
00170                           if (empty($var)) {
00171                                        return false;
00172                           }
00173                           unset($_SESSION[$name]);
00174                           $_SESSION[$name]=$value;
00175              }
00176 
00177              /**
00178               * delete values stored under given name from the session-container
00179               * @param string $name identifier
00180               */
00181              public function delete($name) {
00182                           if (!empty($name)) {
00183                                        unset($_SESSION[$name]);
00184                           }
00185              }
00186 
00187              /**
00188               * checks if you used a valid string  as identifier
00189               * @param string $name may contain a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ._-
00190               */
00191              private function validateKeyName($name) {
00192                           if (is_string($name) && preg_match("/^[0-9a-zA-Z._-]+$/", $name)) {
00193                                        return $name;
00194                           }
00195                           throw new exception("'$name' is not a valid session string identifier");
00196                           return false;
00197              }
00198 
00199              /**
00200               * try to do an educated guess about the users real ip, even if he is behind proxies
00201               */
00202              public function getIp() {
00203                           $it = getUtil('Ip');
00204                           return $it->getIp();
00205              }
00206 
00207              /**
00208               * destroy any current session and all variables stored in the session-container with it
00209               */
00210              public function destroy() {
00211                           session_destroy();
00212              }
00213 }
